item.title: Philips Hue Line Gains Bridge Pro, New Bulbs, Updated Outdoor Lights and More
item.description: Signify today announced a range of new products that are coming out this fall, including an updated bridge, new light strips and bulbs, updated outdoor light options, and some new Hue Secure devices.

item.title: Philips Hue Line Gains Bridge Pro, New Bulbs, Updated Outdoor Lights and More
item.description: Signify today announced a range of new products that are coming out this fall, including an updated bridge, new light strips and bulbs, updated outdoor light options, and some new Hue Secure devices.

item.title: Philips introduces budget-friendly Hue bulbs as part of major lineup overhaul
item.description: New accessories also add Matter support, for those to whom that matters.
